Package org.projectsw.Model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
org.projectsw.Model.Player
public class Player extends Object
Class representing a player in the game.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String nickname, int position)
      Constructs a new player with the given nickname and position. Points are set 0 by default. Shelf is instanced as an empty shelf. The personal goal is assigned randomly.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      position - the position of the player

  • Method Details

    • getIsActive

      public boolean getIsActive()
      Returns true if the player is connected to the server, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true if the player is connected to the server, false otherwise

    • isCommonGoalRedeemed

      public boolean isCommonGoalRedeemed(int i)
      Returns whether the number i common goal has been redeemed or not.
      Parameters:
      i - the index of the personalGoalArray element to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the personal goal has been redeemed, false otherwise

      public void setCommonGoalRedeemed(int index, Boolean status)

      Parameters:

      Parameters:

    • selectTemporaryTile

      public Tile selectTemporaryTile(int i) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Removes and returns the tile at the specified index from the player's temporary tile list.
      Parameters:
      i - the index of the tile to select and remove
      Returns:
      the selected tile
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range (index invalid input: '<' 0 || index >= temporaryTiles.size())

    • tryPersonalGoal

      public PersonalGoal tryPersonalGoal()
      Tries to instance a PersonalGoal object, and iterates in case of IllegalArgumentException, each time generating a new random code.
      Returns:
      a PersonalGoal which isn't used by any of the others players

    • clearTemporaryTiles

      public void clearTemporaryTiles()
      Clears the temporaryTiles array list.

    • removeTemporaryTile

      public void removeTemporaryTile(Tile tile)
      Removes the given tile from the temporaryTiles array list.
      Parameters:
      tile - the tile to be removed from the array
